ingredients: A twist to the classic French dessert: layered between puff pastry sheets, tiramisu filling, vanilla and chocolate cakes, and French cream accented with rum raisins and cranberries.
Soft and moist lemon flavored mini sponge cakes.
A flavorful combination of sausage and shredded cheese. Topped with mayonnaise and Sriracha Chili sauce.
Four fluffy buttermilk pancakes served with warm vanilla maple syrup and a side of applewood smoked bacon.
Scrambled eggs, crisp applewood smoked bacon and cheddar cheese on our grilled country sourdough bread.
Freshly scrambled eggs, applewood smoked bacon, tomatoes, green onions, avocado and cheddar cheese on grilled sourdough.
Scrambled eggs with chicken apple sausage and cheddar & Parmesan cheeses in a grilled multigrain flatbread.
Four fluffy buttermilk pancakes served with warm vanilla maple syrup, freshly scrambled eggs and applewood smoked bacon.
A crisp Belgian waffle served with warm syrup. Served with two eggs and choice of bacon or sausage.

Three slices of our sweet cinnamon roll dipped in egg batter and grilled to perfection. Lightly dusted with powdered sugar and served with warm syrup. Served with two eggs and choice of bacon or sausage.
MULTI-GRAIN & NUT PANCAKES A hearty stack of freshly-made multi-grain pancakes infused with almonds and walnuts, served with warm syrup. Served with two eggs and choice of bacon or sausage.
Natural chicken breast with applewood smoked bacon, fresh avocado, crisp lettuce, fresh tomatoes, red onions, Jack cheese and mayo on fresh-baked ciabatta bread.
A flaky, fresh-baked croissant piled high with thinly sliced natural turkey breast, fresh avocado, Jack cheese, crisp lettuce, fresh tomatoes and mayo.
Natural, thinly sliced roast beef piled high on a fresh-baked French baguette with rich and flavorful au jus.
Sugar and cinnamon-tossed apple slices are baked to perfection beneath a sweet, golden, crumbly topping. Prices may vary by location.
Sweet and tart lemon filling topped with a light meringue in a flaky pastry crust.
